frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopup.original: Hide donation buttons in the popup

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Se ei ole kuin en halua saat Talkie üåü Premium tai lahjoittaa tukemaan Talkie ja avoimen l√§hdekoodin kehitykseen yleens√§ ‚Äî En vain halua sinun olevan vihainen k√§ytett√§ess√§ Talkie ensiksi. Jos poistat lahjoituspainikkeita popup, toivon, ett√§ tuetaan my√∂s Talkie jollain tavalla! Painikkeet ovat aina saatavilla t√§√§ll√§ vaihtoehtojen joukosta, kaiken varalta.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie üåü Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general ‚Äî I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie kehitettiin muutama p√§iv√§ ennen uutta vuotta 2016/2017, on haaste yst√§v√§lt√§. Haasteena alkoi kysymyksen: kun ty√∂matkoja, on mahdollista kuunnella artikkeli sijaan lukea sit√§? Helppo, sanoin, ja l√§hti todistaa sen ‚Äî tai ainakin tehd√§ selain puhua teksti√§ typer√§ tietokone√§√§ni. Perusversio, ilman k√§ytt√∂liittym√§√§, osoittautui triviaalia luoda. Lis√§√§minen k√§ytt√∂liittym√§, kesti hieman kauemmin. Lis√§√§m√§ll√§ asianmukainen kielentunnistus joukko enemm√§n koodia. Selviytyminen bugeja selaimen viel√§kin enemm√§n ty√∂t√§. Luettelo parannuksia ja ominaisuuksia jatkuu ‚Äî ja muutama tuhat rivi√§ koodia my√∂hemmin, etsit lopputulos.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it ‚Äî or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on ‚Äî and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Kiitos, ett√§ k√§yt√§t Talkie ‚Äî jos pid√§t siit√§, kerro yst√§villesi!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie ‚Äî if you like it, tell your friends!

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser.
